title: A Flavour of German - Special Announcement
description: Announcing the premium version of A Flavour of German. If you can't wait until September for the full course, you can purchase all ten episodes in enhanced audio format, featuring the words and phrases taught in each lesson on your iPod or computer screen as you listen. The Season Pass also includes the full lesson guide in pdf format.
content:encoded: Announcing the premium version of A Flavour of German. The Season Pass also includes the full lesson guide in pdf format.
itunes:subtitle: Information about the Season Pass
